CustomField.description: Parent/Guardian: In exchange for CMS allowing my minor child to purchase a membership, I agree to the release of Liability and assumption of risk clauses in this agreement and I agree to defend and indemnify CMS to the fullest extent permitted by the law for any claim brought by my minor child against CMS. I also promise to pay any financial obligation that my minor child does not pay for any reason and acknowledge that the banking information above is my account.
CustomField.label: Cosigner Agreement 1
